required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Volatile Versus Propofol Anesthesia in OPCAB
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Propofol and Isoflurane Anesthesia on Cardioprotection and Clinical Outcomes in Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery : A Propensity-score Analysis

brief_summary.textblock: Off pump coronary artery bypass graft (OPCAB) still requires myocardial protection owing to intermittent regional ischemic episode. The investigators retrospectively evaluated the cardioprotective and clinical outcomes of propofol versus isoflurane anesthesia in patients undergoing OPCAB.

detailed_description.textblock: Several experimental and clinical researches have suggested that volatile anesthetics may reduce mortality in cardiac surgery owing to its preconditioning induced cardioprotective effect. Off-pump coronary artery bypass graft (OPCAB) surgery still requires cardioprotective strategies due to coronary hypoperfusion during anastomosis. The aim of this study was to evaluate the possible cardioprotective effect and clinical outcomes of propofol versus isoflurane anesthesia in patients undergoing OPCAB using propensity matching.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from preoperative value in CK-MR and CRP at Postoperative day(POD), POD 1 and 2
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of CK-MB and CRP values between propofol and isoflurane groups on postoperative day, POD1 and POD 2

secondary_outcome.description: clinical adverse outcomes until postoperative 1 year

other_outcome.measure: Cardioprotection and clinical adverse outcomes in diabetic patients
other_outcome.time_frame: POD, POD 1, POD 2, one month, one year
other_outcome.description: primary and secondary outcome analysis in diabetic patients

clinical_study.condition: Off Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft

arm_group.description: Total intravenous anesthesia with propofol during OPCAB

intervention.description: Comparison between isoflurane and propofol, Retrospective study

study_pop.textblock: patients underwent OPCAB from January, 2010 to December, 2012

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- OPCAB
Exclusion Criteria:
- On pump conversion

clinical_study.keyword: Off pump coronary artery bypass graft
